text: @realDonaldTrump Listen doom to repeat it:  I think, and I could be wrong, that you Favor the Scandinavian and European counties over the African Continent.  But, But, tell me why Liberia got rid of the Ebola Virus within months and the Covid-19 is still Alive and Trending with your Great minds.
